ScriptSample.Name: Start-menu-roaming-for-3d10961c

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-9d29eb4a
ScriptSample.Title: Script Generator for Windows Forms GUIs - Update 7.1

ScriptSample.Summary: Design Windows Forms GUIs with PowerShell functions, and generate PowerShell scripts that can create those GUIs without any dependencies other than PowerShell 2.

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-fd8d3fb5
ScriptSample.Title: Script Generator for Windows Forms GUIs - Update 6
ScriptSample.Author: imfrancisd
ScriptSample.Summary: Design Windows Forms GUIs with PowerShell functions, and generate PowerShell scripts that can create those GUIs without any dependencies other than PowerShell 2.

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-7575ab5d

ScriptSample.Author: imfrancisd
ScriptSample.Summary:
Design Windows Forms GUIs with PowerShell functions, and generate PowerShell scripts that can create those GUIs without any dependencies other than PowerShell 2.
Fixed some subtle mistakes from the previous update.

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-305c0cdb
ScriptSample.Title: Script Generator for Windows Forms GUIs - Update 5
ScriptSample.Author: imfrancisd
ScriptSample.Summary:
Design Windows Forms GUIs with PowerShell functions, and generate PowerShell scripts that can create those GUIs without any dependencies other than PowerShell 2.

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-b3c850b7
ScriptSample.Title: Script Generator for Windows Forms GUIs - Update 3
ScriptSample.Author: imfrancisd
ScriptSample.Summary: This is an updated version of my Windows Forms script generator. It now supports Charts. Improved the help text, added additional resizing options for New-Image, added partial support for icons, and basically just fixed a lot of mistakes. Did I mention charts?

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-8d1419fb

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-c5865b7d
ScriptSample.Title: Script Generator for Windows Forms GUIs - Update 2
ScriptSample.Author: imfrancisd
ScriptSample.Summary: This is an updated version of my Windows Forms script generator. It now supports ContextMenuStrip, MenuStrip, ToolStrip, StatusStrip, and the other ToolStripItems. Added better support for GUI elements that can have multiple parents, and basically just fixed a lot of mistakes.

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-c187f628

ScriptSample.Summary: This is an updated version of my Windows Forms script generator. It now supports images and imagelists, it can generate scripts using PS3 syntax as an option, added script builders for things like datetimepicker and monthcalendar, and basically just fixed a lot of mistakes.

ScriptSample.Name: Script-Generator-for-a691c96f

ScriptSample.Summary: This is a partial update of my Windows Forms script generator.
